name: Businessfriend
tag_list: networking, professional-networking, social-network, social-media, business-tool, collaboration, file-sharing, cloud-storage, organizational-tools, people-search, professional-profiles, company-profiles, college-profiles, recruitment, hr, blogging
overview:
Businessfriend is a professional networking site that also offers it’s members collaboration, organizational, and communication tools. The goal of Businessfriend is to create a professional networking site that goes beyond just networking but helps its members conduct business and increase their productivity.

Businessfriend is the place where social networking leads to productivity. The site connects employees with one another, wherever they may be, and empowers your team(s) with the necessary tools to collaborate and conduct business in their own unique way. It is a platform that enriches your team dynamics in many ways by increasing employee productivity, empowering communication, strengthening corporate culture, and facilitating more meaningful interactions among coworkers. Businessfriend is social networking built for the workplace. Whatever your company’s industry or trade, the platform launches your company into a world of better communication, collaborative work spaces, and business tools that skyrocket your team’s performance to new heights.
